phrases: I said, do whatever you like.
It is not like I like Koizumi or anything.
Did I hear that right, just now?
I have been rejected by the same guy twice?
It is not like I like Koizumi or anything.
Koizumi-san, was that a snapping sound I heard just now?
Maity-sensei, you were so cool just now-chi.
But you seemed a bit out of it today-chi.
Y-You have got it all wrong!
What have we got all wrong?
E-Everything's gone bad because that old man stuck his nose in.
A man who blames his problems on others is the worst.
It is not like I like Koizumi or anything.
I knew it all along, even without hearing him say it out loud.
What should I do from now on?
Well, I guess there is nothing I can do.
Looking back, I have been giving it everything I have got since last summer.
But I guess it was all pointless.
So this is how it is...
So you were rejected once already.
And that just now makes it twice.
You should not let what Otani-kun said just now bother you so much.
That was just his way of hiding his embarrassment.
What could he possibly have to hide or be embarrassed about?
Just now I said, I will take Koizumi-san for myself, as a joke.
And then Otani-kun got angry and replied in that manner.
Why do you think he did that?
Maybe it is because he just does not like you, Maity-sensei.
This time, I think I will give being hated a go.
The truth is, I know how to perform magic.
I can use my magic to bring you happiness, Koizumi-san.
Apparently it is a cheer to support Maity-sama.
Right at this very moment, a frail maiden is having an audible breakdown.
All because of one cold man...
I will be counting on you at practice again today.
If you are not feeling well like last time, just let me know, okay?
I will go easy on you.
I want Koizumi-san to see my good side.
I cannot concentrate with all that noise!
Let us cheer for Otani-san too, then.
It is not good to blame your problems on others.
Why do not you hurry and show me that determination of yours?
Koizumi-san did come to cheer us on, after all.
I need a way to show her my good side.
I have decided to start a new life.
I am going to live my life seeing only Maity-sama.
Why do not you get on the back?
Why do not you quit that disgusting Maity Club.
Never mind why, just quit it.
And besides, it is my choice.
What is with all that anyway?
Are you trying to provoke me?
Because you are a midget who always speaks without thinking.
Who is the one who speaks without thinking?
Who was it that claimed to be in love, then gave up, then randomly blew me off?
Why should I have to hear this from you?
I was shocked to see you would vanished all of a sudden.
I do not need you to.
Well then, I will take Koizumi-san home.
Koizumi just committed to taking me home on this bicycle.
Did not you just say you did not need me to?
Just so you know, I am the one Koizumi-san likes.
There is no way she would fall for someone like you.
D-Do not just go saying things whenever you feel like it.
I do not like you, okay.
I really have no idea what Otani's thinking.
Wh-What is with those smiles you are wearing?
We heard everything from Maity, Risa.
I am the one who was surprised.
I have no idea what is going on with him.
So what happened when you took him home?
I am the one she likes!
Well, I would like to know too.
Do not sigh when you see someone is face in the morning.
We were busted for riding tandem yesterday, remember?
He is emotionally unstable, is not he?
He is definitely jealous because you are paying so much attention to Maity.
Come on, do not be stupid.
I just heard him say he did not like me, not long ago.
But was not that because Maity interfered?
I seriously have no idea what is up with Otani!
But up till now, every time I have gotten my hopes up, I have only been disappointed.
I cannot expect thing to work out anymore.
Otani, what are you going to do about club?
I will just watch you guys practice.
There sure have been a lot of injuries lately.
The coach is not better yet either.
Yeah, but it is only minor.
I am fine, but Otani-senpai is injured.
What is with this odd atmosphere?
Do not say a word about it, Seiko.
Those two are as clueless as baby fawns.
You formed the Maity club, and held some events, right?
Why did not you tell me?
I like Maity a lot, too!
I have liked him ever since I was a kid.
But he was always in Tokyo, so I did not get to see him much.
I was wondering why he is so irritating...
Maity is so much kinder and cooler than this midget that any comparison would be pointless.
If you are going after Maity, you have my support.
Hey, what are you angry about?
You told me to quit, so I quit.
But then when Maity-sensei showed up, you were all, Take me home!
And then you went on saying I am the one she likes,
And in the end you dragged me away by force.
I am going to go help pack up.
I will wait for you by the front gate.
No matter how hard I try, I have no idea what is going on in Otani's head.
But I do not want this weird atmosphere to hang around forever.
Koizumi-san's a nice girl, is not she?
You do not need to tell me.
I am going to kill you!
I am going to kill you!
I am seriously going to kill you!
If I were a girl, I am sure I would not want such a short boyfriend.
But Koizumi-san likes you anyway, huh?
Will you really be okay with it if Koizumi-san goes out with someone else?
You were slow, so I came to get you.
But the bike's going really slow.
That is because you are heavy.
It is actually because you do not have enough strength.
I am going to fall off!
I just want to laugh like an idiot with Otani.
I wonder why things get weird once the idea of liking or disliking comes up?
If I never said that I liked him and just kept going like this...
I think that would be best.
If you have been frustrated or upset because of me...
Up until now I have said a lot of things that have bothered you,
I am really going to stop liking you.
My eyes dried out so much just now that they are getting stuck.
That has nothing to do with it.
This time, we really can go back to the way we were.
Koizumi, are you going to come to cheer me on?
I will bring you lemons in soy sauce.
